overview:
Managing Director of Progress Partners, an advisory investment bank. Work with entrepreneurial companies in digital media (primarily eCommerce & AdTech specific). All engagements are anchored by a targeted banking transaction including raising institutional rounds of financing as well as M&A. Work to become a partner to and extension of clients’ management teams in service of driving financial and operational momentum.

In a former life I spent 15+ years in the public markets as a buy-side value oriented equity analyst with mandates including both long/short and long only.

Specialties M&A advisory, venture capital & private equity capital raises, strategic advisory, business development, private & public market company analysis.
